title: Carmelo Anthony Isn’t Underrated, But He’s Not Overrated Either FiveThirtyEight » DataLab | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: Carmelo Anthony raised eyebrows this week when he told ESPN’s Chris Broussard, “I think I’m the most underrated superstar that’s out there.” Oh, really? Anthony, who plays for the New York Knicks, is a devastating scorer and trails only Kevin Durant and LeBron James in points per game over the past five NBA seasons, but […]
